text:
*HELP NEEDED!*
How can you make sure the root domain of a HubSpot Website redirects to the necessary language based on the users browser language?

Eg. user types in <http://example.com|example.com>
• If browser language is german then redirect to <http://example.com/de|example.com/de>
• else redirect to <http://example.com/en|example.com/en>
What solutions are out there, since we do not get access to the htaccess file?
I created a blog template and I want to add a language switcher with flags. How to achieve this?
